long_description: The 64GB class 10 Sony MicroSDXC Memory Card offers massive storage in a tiny format. It's perfect for loading up on music, photos, video and games on your mobile devices. Memory card offers reliable storage for media-rich applications, including high-definition photos, MP3s and even full 1080p videos. Rugged, waterproof design performs in temperatures ranging from -13deg to 185degF (-25deg to 85degC). Included SD adapter lets you swap the Sony MicroSDXC Memory Card card from you mobile phone to your camera or any other SD compatible host for easy file sharing and transfer.
short_description: The 64GB class 10 Sony MicroSDXC Memory Card offers massive storage in a tiny format. It's perfect for loading up on music, photos, video and games on your mobile devices.
